website_summaries.verdict: Fully adjustable design accommodates newborns, toddlers, and older kids. Hands-down the most versatile Graco convertible car seat around.
pros: 4-in-1 design adapts from a rear and forward facing infant seat to a high back toddler booster and eventually a backless booster seat
Easy to adjust harness and headrest

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! My baby is currently 3 months old & we’ve had this seat since day 1. My daughter was born 1 month premature and only weighed 4lbs 6oz when we left the hospital. She was able to pas a the car seat test that the hospital required to be able to leave. For such a tiny baby the seat really was giant. We had to roll washcloths and place them under her butt to make the smallest strap settings work (hospital’s suggestion). Thankful it does work for tiny babies. (Picture is from when she was 2 weeks old, approx 4lbs 10oz)
customer_reviews.author: Jo'L Rojas

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY-UNSAFE
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS. I purchased two of these back In July. They were great for about 2 months and now the straps and harness comes loose. I have tried to call Graco several times and am on hold for over an hour. There is a 1 year warranty but good luck getting anyone on the phone. Spend the extra money and go with Chicco. Never again will I buy from Graco unless they replace both car seats. I have read that other people were having the same issue from July 2018 as well but there’s no recall on these seats.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C

customer_reviews.title: Safe enough but not comfortable for sleeping kids
customer_reviews.text: While the seat is big enough, it's difficult for children to sleep in these with the current shape of the headrest. This strikes me as a design flaw. The headrest area just isn't sufficient/deep enough to catch the head of a sleeping child. If your child dozes off in this car seat, their head will slip down into a painful angle
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver.
customer_reviews.text: My little one hated his infant car seat so much so he cried the entire time he was in it. So after alot of research we decided to go with the 4ever. He loves it and we've had nothing but silent rides ever since. Easy instructions, and great quality I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Akn

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it!
customer_reviews.text: I hate his car seat with a passion. Do yourself a favor and don’t waste the money. I’m honestly surprised it has so many wonderful reviews. The seat doesn’t get tight enough when RF and the belt hits my baby across the thighs instead of the hips. He also doesn’t sit upright in it. It has this little bump in the lower back area that eventually makes him slouch down, and on a long ride and RF - that could end up very dangerous. Save yourself the headache and money and just get anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Kate

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY-BAD HEAD SLUMP
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t recommend this car seat at all!! My son is 9 months old and we just started using it and once he falls asleep, his head completely slumps forward because the top headrest area sticks out further than the rest. We have talked with car seat techs over and over and made many changes with recline, etc. Nothing has helped and I wish we would’ve gotten something else!
customer_reviews.author: Erika Griffith

customer_reviews.title: The Rattle is Real
customer_reviews.text: The headrest rattles with or without the child in the seat. Totally unacceptable for any new product let alone one priced at this level. No amount of adjustment will correct the issue as it's a manufacturer defect.
customer_reviews.author: Pwhoward1138

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat. Labels get HOT in the summer.
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is great overall. Very easy to install. But I wouldn’t recommend it to a friend. They have plastic labels that fall roughly at the upper and lower back. I bought this car seat before summer. Now, these labels get SO hot. Even when they’re not in direct sunlight. I’ve tried covering them with a jacket to keep the sun away when not in use and even that doesn’t work. Clearly a design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Rholm

customer_reviews.title: Love the seat!! Just have to work with reclining
customer_reviews.text: After doing a lot of research i ended up with this carseat for my husbands truck. Im glad i didnt get the extend2fit because there is no way i could extend . The only thing i noticed is my daughters head is slumped forward if shes asleep. Shes 19 momths so i know its ok i think. I have the nextfit zip in my car and dont have this issue. Im hoping reclining it may work but my husband said the bubble on the indicator wouldnt be in the safe spot so i will try to figure something out. But my daughter seems to like it and i know its a safe seat and thats my top priority.
customer_reviews.author: MMB  .4r e e  e.2 MMBmmm7o

customer_reviews.title: Comparison and this one didn't win
customer_reviews.text: I also own an Evenflo Symphony 65. Comparing the 2, I'd go with the Evenflo. They're both built like the rock of Gibraltar and safety-wise, they're equal, in my opinion. Both weigh closely enough I couldn't tell you the difference. Where the difference lies is in their latch system. Evenflo has a self-racheting system. When I secure that seat, there's NO wiggle whatsoever. When I tried to get this Graco secured, I couldn't get it enough I felt it was safe. Had to have my husband help. Not cool. He's not always home if I need to switch vehicles. If I could, I'd exchange this for an Evenflo.
customer_reviews.author: Sis2Adam

customer_reviews.title: Anchor straps too short
customer_reviews.text: Anchor straps are so short we couldn't install the car seat in two of the three cars we tried. In the third car the straps were too short to put the car seat in the manufacturer's recommended safe recline position. Have to use seat beat installation.
customer_reviews.author: Luke S

customer_reviews.title: I sold my baby trend for a second one of these babies!
customer_reviews.text: So you have to take your baby out of the seat everytime and carry them with you in your arms who cares! This is the best carseat ever! It's so damn sturdy and tilts back for your newborns perfectly! My baby girl has to ride in the car for two hours to her doctor, there and back, she is happy the whole time. I don't trust a carseat you take in and out of a car over and over again. The baby trend with a base We had made her scream bloody murder almost the whole time. I am confident with this carseat and I'm so happy it gives me one less thing to be crazy mom about.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Nerdy OCD

customer_reviews.title: her head falls way down to the side when she sleeps and it looks terribly bad on her neck
customer_reviews.text: I feel that my child is extremely safe. However, when positioned correctly, her head falls way down to the side when she sleeps and it looks terribly bad on her neck. Also, the latch strap is so ridiculously difficult to tighten!!!! I have to have my husband do it with man power. We have two of these seats and they are the same. Makes it crazy to take out and reinstall. And yes, I've watched every single YouTube video to make sure I'm doing everything right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It keeps my kids safe but...
customer_reviews.text: Who ever designed the tightening strap for when you install this in the car, I want to meet him because I want to punch him in the face. Seriously, once you install it, hopefully you never have to take it out. Pain in the ass! Its also horrible to take apart to clean it. Because if you have small kids that use one of these, eventually a blow out diaper is going to result in taking this apart. That makes a bad experience even worse! It gets 3 stars because my kids are safe in it.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Great for every stage besides infants
customer_reviews.text: The way the strap installation works makes it difficult to tighten down enough. I want to give this 5 stars because it looks and feels like the Cadillac of car seats but.. If you have an infant, this doesn’t have a handle, nor does it detach from the base. So you can’t bring it in to restaurants or anywhere, meaning you have to have another option for the infant. Additionally, it’s heavy! So, switching the car seat between vehicles is a cumbersome process. We ended up getting the Grace snugride 30 for a fraction of the cost (in addition to this one) so we’d have a car seat that can easily swap vehicles, and that we can take into places
customer_reviews.author: Adam Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Fits in small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: We are upgraded from and infant seat. Our daughter is on the taller side for her age group. As shown a comparison of her in her pumpkin seat v this graco. She’s 6 months old and 27.5 inches and roughly 17 lbs. She offen sits campfire style in her pumpkin seat. With this graco seat, she has a lot more leg room! This car seat was easy to install in our Jeep Patriot. Compared to the pumpkin seat we actually like how this one fits. I really recommend this seat for people with small suvs or cars.
customer_reviews.author: Chris&kayla

customer_reviews.title: Saved my 8-week-old’s life
customer_reviews.text: This car seat saved my baby’s life. I was hit head on by a driver crossing 3 lanes; my airbags deployed and my car was totaled. I was burned, cut, bruised, had soft tissue damage and more...but my baby? SHE WAS PERFECT. Not a scratch on her, wasn’t even crying. The first responders said that we had picked the best car seat and that it had protected her well. We went out and immediately bought the same one (you have to trash a car seat once it has been in an accident). I would highly recommend this Car seat to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Best carsear ever
customer_reviews.text: I had this exact car seat and was in a car accident. It was not a horrific accident or anything, just a rear end situation, but, I did need to replace all 3 of my car seats. Kudos to Geico for replacing my car seats with no questions asked. I got the exact same one because I had (I did get a different color because the one I had prior I couldn’t find on amazon) loved its previous version. I wish they would’ve had these 9 years ago when I started having babies. Would’ve saved me a boat load of money with booster seats and all that.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Grisanti

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I spent literally hours reading articles and reviews, before choosing a convertible carseat. I ended up getting the Safety 1st grow and go, and returning it (I left a review for that as well). So then we got this, for twice the price, and it's Worth. Every. Penny. Installation was super quick and easy, literally, just a couple minutes. Very intuitive and user friendly. Everything about this is much sturdier, more solid, higher quality compared to its other brand counterpart. This is the one to buy. Love everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Nani Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Anyone looking to buy a car seat has done an insane amount of research. Stop no further than this seat. It was so easy to install, and I actually just took it to a police seat check and was told that I did a great job installing it. The cup holders are convenient and do not take up too much room. Harness is super easy to click and tighten. Also love that this seat will last so long. The officers told me that a regular booster essentially has no expiration since you'll use the car's seat belt. For the price and safety ratings of this seat, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: The only car seat you need
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great car seat. My first son used it from when he graduated a newborn seat until he was big enough for a booster and now my second son is in it. Love that I will not have to buy another car seat for my second son as it converts to a booster. It’s pretty cumbersome, but is very secure. It seems comfortable, and I like the features like the cup holders and ability to recline it from the front seat if it’s forward facing (we had a long trip at night in the car and it was great to make our son more comfortable without disturbing him or having to stop).
customer_reviews.author: J. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Get this seat if you can afford it. It's worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This carseat is expensive, but completely worth it. My kids spend a lot of time in their carseats. Knowing they are safe and comfortable makes it easier on all of us. I love that they are easy to install and adjust. My 3 year old and 18 month old can quickly switch seats and fit securely for their different sizes. The seat reclines easily for nap time or long drives. Knowing they'll last their entire carseat journey makes it a worthy investment if you can swing it. We waited until the seats were on sale. Plan ahead and you can save $100+ on this seat.
customer_reviews.author: dnadtktv

customer_reviews.title: Reclines well
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews prior to purchasing this seat. When my 8 month old sleeps his head stays supported and we do not hear a rattle coming from the seat. I do agree that the material keeps baby warm. His back is covered in sweat after even a short car ride. Other than that there are no drawbacks. I like the reclining positions and the durability of the fabric. The seat is very easy to recline. I like that the shoulder straps are attached so that when you lift the head piece up the straps move too. They will always be at the correct height and no more fishing straps through holes when it’s time to change them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A sound buy.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this in the studio design. No complaints whatsoever. We had CHP install the seat so installation for us was a breeze! :) Easy to get my son in and out. Doesn’t make any noise whether he’s in it or not. The cup holders are so handy and he instantly knew what they were for at 12 months old :) Threw his baba straight in lol. Just got back from a road trip and he was happy and napping off and on during the drive. I’ve lurked this for months before I bought it and the price goes down the lowest right before Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great seat - especially for my tall baby
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is long (97th percentile for height), so she outgrew her infant chair fast. This has an adjustable head piece that slides up and down, so you don't have to deal with threading shoulder straps or the constant pain of the straps sliding down and out of place. As she grows, you just pull the head piece up and the straps slide higher. It also has several reclining positions, so if she's napping, I can adjust the recline so she is more comfortable. And I love that this seat will last until she outgrows car seats. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Renee B.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this seat!
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to install, and my daughter loved the upgrade. She will be rear facing for a while, but she started out in the typical infant car seat. Once she started getting a little bigger, I purchased this for her. She loves sitting up higher and being able to see out of the window. The car seat was easy and quick to install. She seems to be comfortable, and it is easy to make adjustments with the seat as she grows.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable car seat for my little one
customer_reviews.text: We love this car seat. My daughter hated riding in the car in her old carrier so we switched to this convertible car seat. She now enjoys car rides and doesnt feel as enclosed and restricted as she did in the carrier. We followed other review advice and left the newborn lower seat in to lift her higher until she grows. This gives her more head support. Will definitely buy again for our next child.
customer_reviews.author: Christine B.

customer_reviews.title: Baby car seat must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with this car seat! I’m so glad that my spouse and I decided on this one compared to the hundreds that we looked at. Our little one is three months old now and this fits him perfectly. We use the infant pieces that fit on the seat still and he just looks so cute in this. It is so super easy to use and adjust and place in car. I love how it is rear facing and front facing! I truly cannot say anything bad at all about this because it is perfect! I’ll be being another one of these for my next child to grow into as well. This is a baby must y’all!
customer_reviews.author: Jess Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product, baby likes it!
customer_reviews.text: I Sas desperate because my baby would cry every time she was in her infant car seat. Other parents suggested to change the carseat to a convertible one, and after researching I decided this was the best choice. So far we're very satisfied with the purchase. Baby cried some sporadic times since in this carseat. But she has been quiet looking out of the window like she had never done before! Putting her in and out is very easy. I find challenging (almost imppssible) to incline the seat while in rear facing. Installing it is so easy and fast. I have removed the infant head support because it seemed too much for my 4 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandra

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Warehouse Fail- not like new
customer_reviews.text: This is our second carseat, exactly the same. We love this carseat! I tried saving some money and bought from Amazon Warehouse with the description that the product was "like new" and just had minor damage to the box. The box had been previously opened and the picture torn from tape- that's fine. What isn't fine is that the box and seat wreaked of baby spit up when I opened it, and the carseat was visibly dirty from baby spit up. I was able to wash it out, but not exactly how I wanted to spend my time before popping the seat in our car to go on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Stamets

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, and puts my once inconsolable child to sleep every ride!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I upgraded to this after 5 mths because we didn't want to have to buy different seats for every phase our son went through. It's only been a week and we've been very satisfied! Not only was it very simple to install, our baby sleeps like a champ in this seat! He used to start crying either immediately or soon after leaving to the point he would spit up and start coughing, now he has fallen asleep every time we've put him in the car. Even if he starts to cry, it's very lightly, and then he dozes off. Obviously it's very comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Logan k Stewart

customer_reviews.title: 2 month old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, i was once reading tons of carseat reviews too! But, look no further! The graco forever is all u need. I was nervous about this purchase, i actually bought another one on amazon that was cheaper and i woke up at 3am that night, canceled the order and ordered this one! Lol. I dont regret it. My girl feels so big and can look at everything now. It has so many great features that make it easy to use. The color Kylie is super cute as well. Excited for the future with this one and done carseat. 🙂
customer_reviews.author: CoCo

customer_reviews.title: Good seat for newer cars... I think
customer_reviews.text: I have older vehicles that make it very difficult to install easily. I swap cars often and normally have to just thread the seatbelt through the hole and only clip one side of the provided buckles. My husband then comes behind me and rachet straps the other side I can't hook. I feel like my child is comfortable and safe but my anxiety skyrockets when I have to change cars. I wish I would have just kept the infant seat and click connect base. But it looks comfy and again, I DO feel my baby is safe.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great carseat
customer_reviews.text: Love the carseat. We were looking for a convertible carseat for our growing nine month old and this is a great fit. Only complaint I have is that the headrest insert comes out every time I put the baby in or out the carseat. There is a small elastic band on the bad of the carseat back support but it does not stay in very well. We may have to add some velcro to keep it from falling out each time.
customer_reviews.author: Ambeezy Conyeezy

customer_reviews.title: The best we’ve owned yet!
customer_reviews.text: Should’ve just started with this instead of Chicco Keyfit Next because my son was never enough of a car sleeper to benefit from a carrier system. Should’ve started with this car seat and a stroller separate (since I wore him more anyways). Live & learn. Second baby will get their own, too! Seat feels almost like memory foam, way more breathable, and STURDY! Also looks FANTASTIC in our vehicle. Did a 12 drive to the Florida Keys with our 11 mo old in it and it was PERFECT with all the recline options for sleep and play.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Greenwald

customer_reviews.title: Very safe. Very sturdy. Quality fabric and easy to wash.
customer_reviews.text: We bought the older edition of this car seat for my first daughter when she was a little younger than one and it’s still in amazing condition over 3 years later. It’s a great fit, kind of heavy so I wouldn’t recommend moving it from car to car if you can, but really sturdy and great. Love that the pads are removable and can be washed, as kids grow this is a great feature. My husband loves that it has the extra locks that hook into the crack of the seat as a lot of car seats don’t have these. Extra safety feature.
customer_reviews.author: HernandezFamily4

customer_reviews.title: A sound investment.
customer_reviews.text: I love this seat so much, that we've purchased three of them. My son falls asleep in the car, every time I put him in this seat, which he never did before. It's hard to install with the new LATCH, but be patient, it isn't impossible, it just takes some muscle. I'm also happy that I won't need to run out and buy a booster seat in the future. My son is so comfortable in it, that I am going to switch out my daughters Britax seat for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M.

customer_reviews.title: This seat reclines nicely. When my little one takes a nap in ...
customer_reviews.text: This seat is heavy but not as heavy as out Britax. We bought a Britax for my oldest daughter but because it is so heavy, we wanted to try something else. We wish we had this seat for my older daughter too. This seat reclines nicely. When my little one takes a nap in the car, it is nice to prop it back and let her rest comfortably. Her head doesn't hang and she doesn't get that awful neck pain that my other daughter does. I would definitely buy this seat again.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great Car seat!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I and our 2 years old son were in a car accident. Our van was totalled,but this car seat held true to promises and most of the reviews. My son was held tight in the seat. Absolutely no injuries to our son. I feel like if we had chosen a different car seat I might be saying this differently. I am purchasing another Graco 4ever as a replacement since it is recommended after an accident. Thank you Graco for making such a great car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Overall it is a pretty nice seat
customer_reviews.text: We have the Graco 4ever and the Britax marathon. Overall it is a pretty nice seat, but I think the Marathon feels a little sturdier. We got the Graco because it has cup holders where the Marathon doesnt. It does come with nice padding and is pretty easy to install. I feel like the straps do get tangled though which is always annoying. I do like that this Graco has the no rethread straps- super convenient for changing different height kids in and out of the same seat.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: This car seat is so great!
customer_reviews.text: As all new parents are, we were overwhelmed by the options out there for carseats. I heard and read good things about this carseat so we decided to just go for it. I am so glad we decided on this one. It is very easy to install in the car. I feel like our baby is very secure. It is the only carseat we have had since she was born and it was great for her even when she was really small. I am looking forward to seeing how it works for her as she transitions to the other configurations. We'll likely purchase this same car seat for subsequent siblings.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Van Arsdel

customer_reviews.title: It did it’s job!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Graco 4Ever car seats due to our first being in a car accident. This car seat definitely performed and did it’s job I’m keeping our kiddo safe. I love that it is adjustable at every stage and age. My little guy is still rear facing in his and is comfy as can be! It was a little difficult getting it equaled out and leveled appropriately when installing the first time (it probably took me an hour), but I have since gotten the hang of it and can easily install and remove the car seat with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: A great seat among many
customer_reviews.text: Beyond great safety ratings this seat sealed the deal with the fact that I can use it until my child no longer needs a car seat. Durable, all covers are removable and washable holding up to front loader on warm and air drying. We have had this particular one for a year and the same seat, different color, for three years going strong. Easy to install, buckle, tighten straps. I recommend this seat to all parents!
customer_reviews.author: Mach

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get them in and out of
customer_reviews.text: We got two of these, one for each car, and one installed very easily but the other felt like I was going to have a hernia getting it tight enough. It's easy to get the kid in and out, and easy to adjust as they grow. My wife picked these out because of all the reviews this seat had after various types of car accidents and kids avoiding major injuries (we haven't tested it out in that manner but knock on wood we wont have to find out for ourselves).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this car seat. She has tons of room and space and it’s very padded and comfy for her to sit in. The two cup holders are a plus, though the don’t hold most sippy cups with handles very well. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because this thing weighs a ton and takes forever to install correctly. It does take a bit more effort to tighten the straps properly, but all in all it’s a great car seat
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Must have.
customer_reviews.text: It was not the easiest to buckle rear facing but that’s not a huge deal to me. It seriously looks so safe and comfy and my 10mo old no longer screams in the car. This car seat is a must. Only thing I’m not huge on is it’s kind of bulky. If you’re putting multiple seats next to each other this may not work for you. We have three rows so we have two toddler car seats in the back row and this rear facing one in the middle row.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat
customer_reviews.text: This car seat has been wonderful. My daughter HATED her infant seat. She would scream every time she was in the car. However, she loves this one. I love that there are 3 recline levels for rear facing. Some babies just prefer to be sitting up rather than recliner. Looks great too. Only complaint is that it doesn’t fit well in my husband’s 2014 pickup truck. I have an SUV so it isn’t much of an issue but we can’t swap vehicles easily
customer_reviews.author: kbkat2004

customer_reviews.title: Secure fit
customer_reviews.text: Have gotten these for 2 kids and love them. The key fit is the most important thing to me. I feel like I get it tighter than the other types making it more secure. My husband and I have both worked in EMS and these are our go to carseats for our kids.
customer_reviews.author: Mama

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy installation
customer_reviews.text: We have this seat for my now 3 year old and just installed the exact same seat for my 7 month old. The only bummer so far is my older child’s feet and legs are definitely out of room, but we are keeping him rear facing as long as possible (until 40 lbs). Seems to be a sturdy seat, easy to install and appears to be reliable. Plus the black and white stripe makes the seat look more modern and looks better in the car ;)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great carseat
customer_reviews.text: A little heavy but really easy to install! It is a little bulky for rear facing in a compact car but we make it work! Not sure if it is because of the car size or the way it is made, but I can not adjust the recline after it is secured down. It has the level bubble on the side that makes it easier then the ones with the red line. The material in the seat and the plastic clips feel secure . And the baby doesnt sweat as much as with the other carseat. All in all it is worth the extra money!
customer_reviews.author: Kristianna Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Best Carseat!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT SO MUCH!!!! First of all, i love that there are two cupholders! This makes it easy not use for a drink, but if my son has a small toy, he can put it in there, or his sunglasses! It is super sturdy and seems to be comfortable. We got in a car accident which is why we had to get a new carseat. We had the Nautilus before, and I loved it, but this one is so much better. It seems to be safer in my opinion! Love the color as well!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Anders

customer_reviews.title: Love this All-In-One!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it honestly. Had my eye on it since the day my baby was born, but I used the infant carry for the convenience of being able to click it into the stroller when baby was newborn. I got this as soon as he was big enough to sit up in carts and was getting heavy to carry in the infant carrier. Even buying it when he was 9 months still felt worthwhile, won't ever have to buy a booster seat and this carseat feels really sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBleu

customer_reviews.title: Worth trying.
customer_reviews.text: So far our 3 year old loves his new seat! He is forward facing and I do notice the head-rest pushes his head forward a bit more than his previous one did, so this might become a bit of a problem when he falls asleep because it looks like his head will end up rolling forward. We have this seat in a Subaru outback '16 and our back bench seats reclined back as far as they go(which is only a few inches) in an attempt to make up for this. Overall we (and out toddler) are very happy with this purchase and are excited this could be the last seat he will ever need! Will update as we go:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good seat but I received a used car seat
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this car seat years ago for my older kids so now that my youngest is outgrowing his infant seat I knew I wanted to buy this seat again. However upon receiving the car seat we realized this was actually used before and was not brand new because the expiration date is 2026 and the seat is supposed to last 10 years. There were scuff marks in some areas and the infant insert for the head was missing. I’ve never really had a problem like this before but returned right away and went out to Target to buy another since I needed a bigger seat for my son before a road trip.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: My favorite car seat
customer_reviews.text: my daughter has this car seat, another Graco in her fathers, and a safety first in her grandmas that broke and got replaced with another graco. We also had an evenflo Carey car seat. This is my all time favorite. Safest and sturdiest in my opinion which out weighs it staying in the car during the early months. I bought it for my niece since I liked it so much with my daughter
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Love this seat
customer_reviews.text: Love this seat. It's easy to adjust the straps by pulling a lever at the topoint if the seat and lifting, no threading the straps through different slots. The anchor clips are the easiest to attach and detach than other car seats over had. They are a little tricky to move them from the rear facing to forward facing. It took a little bit of time to figure that one out. Itshe's padded and looks comfortable for the next long car ride. I'm happy with this seat so I bought another one for my toddler.
customer_reviews.author: AMC

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat and the multifunction use
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat and the multifunction use. Wish we got this when daughter was still an infant, though I loved being able to lug her in her carrier when she slept. It's pretty easy to install, wish the belt tightening part was easier on the hands. I had to out my body weight on the car seat while my husband tightened with all his strength. Like the bubble indicator and the easy guide arrows of where placemenyushould be depending on rear or forward facing.
customer_reviews.author: mariella

customer_reviews.text: This is our third 4Ever 4in1. It easily installs and goes from one age group to the next with no problems. We started our great grandparent journey with a different brand and after having to go up in size with a whole new seat twice times three, this is fabulous. We have purchased this one for us, our daughter the grandma & the grandchildren (the parents). Wish I had found this one first!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool looking car seat plus love the fact I ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool looking car seat plus love the fact I will not need to buy another seat since this is a 4 in 1. U h more comfortable for baby than other one we were using. Only downside is that in my SUV in the rear facing position at the number 2 reclining position (of course the one that fits my baby best) the anchors do not reach, so I have to use the seatbelt. However, with a different reclining position or when forward facing they will reach.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tynes

customer_reviews.title: Strong Hate.
customer_reviews.text: My Infant‘a head sagged while asleep. Now that he’s almost 2 the belts hardly work. I hate this car seat with a passion. I just ordered a second Graco milestone to replace this one. My husband has it in his truck and it’s a breeze. Bought milestones at Costco.
customer_reviews.author: SAM.

customer_reviews.title: Loving the updated seat!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this seat! It's big and bulky; too heavy to lug between cars. Recently transitioned my 9 month old into this, and she's super comfy. We bought the same seat, in 2016, for our now 2 year old. They've made a minor change with the strap release button, which is now covered with a layer of fabric. Genius, pure genius. I've lost count of how many times I've had to try to vacuum out goldfish cracker crumbs from my toddler's seat's button!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t safely fit my 19 inch tall baby!
customer_reviews.text: We had to buy a second car seat to take baby home from the hospital. Baby was 19 inches long, so not tall enough to safely ride in the seat. The hospital car seat inspector nixed it as soon as she adjusted the shoulder straps. If you’re going to buy this seat, maybe wait until after baby is born, & borrow a seat from someone for the first few days/weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Beardhole Hambleton

customer_reviews.title: A very nice, beefy, and heavy car seat
customer_reviews.text: Very solidly-built, and very adjustable. The construction appears to be much beefier than other all-in-ones. The base is smooth and flat, so this should help keep your car's seats from getting permanent marks in them from having this installed (though, to be safe, I'd still recommend getting a car seat saver/protector/liner). Do note, it is a rather heavy seat. We travel with ours on occasion, and lugging it around the airport and in a plane is rather cumbersome. If you pack it for luggage, I recommend getting a good padded car seat luggage bag/case for it. I'd definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a good, safe car seat that will last for many years of their child's growth.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Big and strong
customer_reviews.text: It's a big car seat compared to Graco travel system that we had been using till recently. Also, it looked sturdier. We loved this car seat because it can grow with our child. Also, there is a slot for user manual! We found it very neat. When our child grows and we need to adjust the car seat, we won't need to scramble for the user manual.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is great. Once you know how to adjust for height of your baby it's pretty easy assembly and install. This car seat was better priced on amazon than any other supplier (target/Buy Buy Baby). I bought two. I will say they are quite large and are not compact car compatible, the passenger will be in discomfort. We had a rental car at one point, Nissan Maxima, and the passenger seat was all the way up and forward to accommodate for the car seat. Other than that I have no complaints. This car seat is great!
customer_reviews.author: Khalisee82

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, grows with my child!
customer_reviews.text: This carseat is amazing. This was the second one we buaght for our child. So easy to install and adjustable the whole time he is growing. No need to take anything apart everytime he gets a little taller. Switching from reverse to forward took less than 5 minutes. I have taken all of the fabric off multiple times to wash it and it has gone back together with no issues at all! This is a huge plus when it comes to kids!
customer_reviews.author: Trista Karlskin

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Got into a car accident one week after purchasing this car seat. Unfortunately we ended up having to get rid of it. Our car was totaled but our baby was safe! Only a few scratches from the glass shards. Hopefully we will have enough money to purchase another car seat like this in the near future!
customer_reviews.author: Kylee C

customer_reviews.title: Cup holders
customer_reviews.text: It's a fine carseat, and I like how it will stick with my oldest until she's ready to just sit in a seat. My biggest/main issue is that the cup holders are on the small side--I cannot fit my daughter's contigo in them at all. And most kids' sippee cups/bottles are going to be too big for these cup holders. So just be aware, you'll need a slimmer bottle for these for long car trips. Or maybe just use them to hold goldfish.
customer_reviews.author: Sammi

customer_reviews.title: After HOURS of research....WE HAVE A WINNER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I researched carseats more than I did for any paper in college. My daughter was born at 34 weeks and was a little over 4 pounds when she came home. This car seat held her snug then and I felt she was safe in it. She is now a happy, healthy & nearly 20lb 9 month old and still loves her car seat. She has never cried in the car....EVER! It is easy to adjust. I recommend watching YouTube videos on installation to get some tips on a secure install.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Burlison

customer_reviews.title: Great Seat
customer_reviews.text: I do lots of research when I'm buying an item such as this for my baby. This seat exceeded my expectations. I'm so excited that this seat grows with my lo. I don't have to worry with buying another seat due to the quality. Thanks Graco for making a great seat. Some reviews state that the headrest "rattles"; I have yet to hear any rattles in this seat. It is a heavy seat to move from one vehicle to another but that just proves the quality & safety Graco put into this seat. It is steel reinforced so I'm at ease each time I strap my lo into this seat. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: You’ll love it.
customer_reviews.text: Kinda pricey but definitely worth the money. Enough padding to keep little one safe and snug. After researching many seats this one is the best one I’ve found.
customer_reviews.author: c_helms

customer_reviews.title: Most tense moment in a long while.
customer_reviews.text: Baby started crying when it arrived, had to explain it was her new seat and that the old seat was too small and that it's pretty and it's a gift. I would have let her cry but my wife was adamant that we had to break the news to her, I'm like she isn't 2yrs old yet and we've got to negotiate. Then the sad face and I buckled like a straw house in a fierce wind. Baby is happy now and she is enjoying the cup holders and the safety.
customer_reviews.author: DelKar

customer_reviews.title: Happy momma and baby!
customer_reviews.text: Love this carseat! I purchased this to replace my son's infant carrier. So comfy and roomy for my 7 month old. So far, he likes riding in the seat. So many different options for reclining and what not as well. I read a lot of reviews before choosing a seat and I'm very pleased to have chosen this one. Fits nicely in our GMC Terrain. I think for the price this is an excellent value. My husband said it was fairly easy to install with latch system. Straps and headrest were easy to adjust as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Jergler

customer_reviews.title: Nice seat!! Interested to see if it'll last the rest of time.
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy that a company came out with a car seat that will last for many years to come!! With my first child, I bought 4 car seats and a booster. So I am curious to see if this car seat will last my baby's car seat exsistance. It fit nicely in the backseat of my Trailblazer. The only thing I noticed it my sons head seems to be pushed forward, even on the furthest recline. Not really a big deal since we don't really take long car rides. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kubi

customer_reviews.title: So far we love it!
customer_reviews.text: We have a Mercedes GLA 250 and we originally had a Britax Marathon convertible, but it was just soo big. This is a little more compact and fits better. The one thing I don’t like is how hard it is to tigthten the straps, but I just pull them from behind the seat since we are rear facing, then pull the strap. Plus the stripe pattern is adorable and the moveable headrest/upper straps is key. No need to uninstall and move straps as the grow.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Works in our Jeep Wrangler
customer_reviews.text: We use this car seat in our Jeep Wrangler unlimited and it fits good. The front seat isn’t pushed all the way forward. (Baby is rear facing). We have the platinum version for our other vehicle and I strongly suggest that one if you have a sleeper it protects their head better.
customer_reviews.author: Spuderific

customer_reviews.title: Long term favorite
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install with latch system. Fits nicely in our Honda Accord and is snug in a Toyota Tacoma. Even though it’s for babies starting at 5 pounds, our 6 pounder was awkward and seemed uncomfortable on the way home from the hospital. Leading us to have to purchase an additional infant carrier (chicco keyfit30). Still love this seat when he’s bigger since we can rear face for longer.
customer_reviews.author: Swiggle

customer_reviews.title: Only car seat that met my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I do not want to do a huge review as there is already many of those, but this car seat is the one I chose for my baby’s safety after doing 4 days of pure research. This means a lot to me since it’s for my baby’s life and I am willing to spend the money if it’s worth it, and this car seat definitely is! My daughter looks so comfortable and protected in it and I couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.A

customer_reviews.title: Best Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Graco 4ever. We got one for mine and one for my husband's vehicle. We will be purchasing a third one, once our youngest grows out of his infant seat! The safety ratings are great, it is very comfortable and it is extremely easy to move from one vehicle to another. It does leave an imprint on leather seats so I recommend getting a seat protector. I highly recommend this. Amazing seat!
customer_reviews.author: Lezlee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is amazing. Bug, durable and has lots of padding so your little one is comfortable, but is heavy and sturdy enough to ensure safety. The car seat is easily installed and takes up on of the passenger seats in the back. This is quite a heavy and hefty seat, so it would not be easily carried around like a bucket car seat for infants because of the size. The fact that it converts and can last for many years due to the weight and height allowances, it is absolutely worth the investment. We bought one and just purchased a a second for our other car.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Miller

customer_reviews.title: This car seat is perfect. My 6lbs oz baby fit very nice and ...
customer_reviews.text: I was completely against getting an infant car seat simply to have to buy another car seat a few months later. This car seat is perfect. My 6lbs oz baby fit very nice and snuggly as a newborn and has grown with the car seat. My hospital did not have an issue with it nor required an "infant car seat" as I had been told by people that hospitals required such (I made sure to bring the manual to the hospital in case the nurses had an issue, the manual states it is for 5lbs and up). It looks very safe, it is easy to set up, and it stays put.
customer_reviews.author: Jasiel

customer_reviews.title: Kind of loose on seat... can’t get ...
customer_reviews.text: Kind of loose on seat...can’t get to not move on seat. Thinking it’s user error but if it’s that hard to install properly then not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat. Difficult installation
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat. Challenging to move from one car to another. If you are using the lap belt to secure the car seat and have large hands, good luck getting the strap through the designated area. Also the clips that attach to newer cars in the cracks of the seats are not long enough to use in each car unfortunately. We found using the lap belt to be easier in my truck at least.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Nuna Rava VS Graco 4Ever. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I had the Nuna Rava before purchasing this car seat which I actually loved! But I quickly noticed it wasn’t going to work with my growing toddler. So I purchased the Graco 4ever. It doesn’t “lock in” as tight as the Nuna Rava but definitely closer then I had seen in other seats. The leg room is great & the 5 point harness clicks well. I also like that it’s simple to adjust & to install. Delivery did take a little while but I also purchased in between holidays. No cons here :).
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: EASY INSTALL
customer_reviews.text: We transitioned my son to this seat at 6 months old and he LOVES it. We have used it a good 4 months now and he is much more comfortable in it and the size is perfect. I have it in my 2010 Toyota Corolla S and it fits PERFECT! Its easy to get him in/out of the seat and I like that the shoulder straps easily come off (Velcro) so you can wash often since they get slobbered on quite a bit. I've had to take the seat out of my car on occasion and switch it to another car and it seriously takes me less than a minute to make the switch, its that simple!
customer_reviews.author: Brittne

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, very secure for the child, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don't really have anything negative to say about these car seats. We bought two of these and other than they are a bit heavy to take in and out of a car a lot, they are really excellent seats. We bought two of them so they could remain attached in each vehicle so the heaviness it's not a problem for us. They are very versatile, easy to make the child comfortable and will expand easily as the child grows. I feel certain that the baby will not outgrow this car seat. Would definitely recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Harris

customer_reviews.title: Made for product liability attorneys
customer_reviews.text: It’s covered in like two dozen warnings and notices. I challenge anyone to move the latch from rear to front-facing, and say it was clear or intuitive—even with the 110-page manual. Beyond that, it looks like a circus product—in classic American design for children. I regret no going with Britax again.
customer_reviews.author: amg8

customer_reviews.title: Great Carseat!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great carseat. The colors are nice. I bought this carseat for my one year old. The padding is nice. Having two cups is nice. It fits well in the back seat of my car (two carseats in the back). I don't have any complaints about the carseat. I have another one in a different color. I was worried that this color combo would be too bright for me but I like it a lot. I also like that it doesn't seem too hot which is important in FL.
customer_reviews.author: This App barely works

customer_reviews.title: Great seat
customer_reviews.text: Our son is growing up so fast, this was the only seat we found to adapt very easily and quickly. Very easy to take apart and clean as well
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Rahmani

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: A must have! Definitely worth it. My daughter feels very comfortable sitting in it. It is bulky though, so i am not sure if it would fit in smaller cars. I have a durango and a chrysler and it fits perfectly. I would consider though having 3 of those in the back, i doubt it would fit. Overall good car seat!
customer_reviews.author: Christine F.

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy the target, meijer, or wal mart brands anymore.
customer_reviews.text: Not gonna go into major detail because other reviewers have said it all already. This car seat is well worth the price since you get 10 years or so out of it. My son is switching to forward facing today, upon arrival of the seat. Before putting into the vehicle, I changed the seat over to forward facing. There are youtube videos I watched on the process so I had a small advantage but it really is not difficult. The construction seems very good and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kunkel Family

customer_reviews.title: Worth it in the long term.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Really weird fit for premie and 6 lbs 7 ounce baby though. She was too small for it and wished we had a carrier at first instead too, terrible first experience because of a lot of other things factoring in too but in the long run this will be worth it as she is 18 weeks and falls asleep in it. She's much more comfortable in this than the carrier too.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: I love this carseat! I wish I would've bought it from the start.
customer_reviews.text: My son was a preemie & weighed 4lbs 11oz when we brought him home. I was so nervous about the right carseat for his size. We actually had 2 different carseats (one for my car, one for my husbands). So between the 2 I love this one because now at 10 months my son can still use it unlike the other we bought. The instructions were really easy & I can easily take it in & out of my car. The price might seem like a lot but when you compare it to never having to buy different stage carseats it totally pays for itself.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Graham

customer_reviews.title: The adjustments are VERY easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The adjustments are VERY easy to use... just a quick snap to adjust the headrest an shoulder straps, as well as the recline. My daughter is rear facing still 15 months, 21lbs) and my only suggestion is to make sure that you are checking the level on the seat BEFORE you get the latch belt tightened up. Since the recline adjustment is at the front of the seat, you can't really access it once the seat is latched in and tight.
customer_reviews.author: carlyann13

customer_reviews.title: Great investment; Solid car seat
customer_reviews.text: Buy this car seat for your 10 month and you not need to think about getting another car seat for the rest of your life. We upgraded from an infant Graco seat to this one when our child turned 10 months old and have been happy with this seat since. We carry this seat with when we travel on planes and used it at our destination. It survived the airline baggage handlers which proved this is a tough product!!
customer_reviews.author: Captain G

customer_reviews.title: Very frustrated
customer_reviews.text: This carseat is really nice and comfy for my little girl. However, I absolutely hate it. To install it rear facing is a huge pain! You literally cannot tighten the strap to make the seat not move everywhere (I am not sure what the technical term for that strap is). I hope it's easier to install when I can turn her front facing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this seat so far.
customer_reviews.text: I found it fairly easy to install. If installing rear facing, it is difficult to change how much it is tilting once it is strapped to the seat, so figure out the right position before securing the product to the actual vehicle seat. A few of the padded items are loose and can be easily lost or misplaced and sometimes are just in the way. So far child likes the seat and seems comfortable. Love that it will grow with my child. So far happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just purchased again after car accident!
customer_reviews.text: After extensively reading reviews, I purchased this carseat back in June. Three months later, in September, me and son were in an accident. A pickup truck blew a stop sign at 55mph. I was left with a broken arm and needed surgery but my son (12 months old at the time) was not injured at all! We are incredibly thankful for that. When our auto insurance reimbursed us for the damaged carseat, we did not hesitate to purchase this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Erinspiration

customer_reviews.title: Very safe
customer_reviews.text: Just buy it. I spent way too long analyzing different carseats because I'm cheap but want the best for my baby. I got mine on prime day so i didn't have to pay so much. But I'm so happy i got it in the end. Im confident in her safety. And its so easy to set up and use. Connecting it to the links in the back seat is a breeze but disconnecting is even easier. Save yourself the headache i gave myself and just get it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Mankey

customer_reviews.title: Cute yet safe
customer_reviews.text: My 1 y. o loves her new seat. We had 1 similar to it and was in a rear & front ended accident and my baby girl was fine for the most part even with the car seat being damaged. The stripes are beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Mzprettyblack12

product_meta.title: Graco 4Ever 4 in 1 Convertible Car Seat | Infant to Toddler Car Seat, with 10 Years of Use, Studio
product_meta.description:
Graco 4Ever 4-in-1 Car Seat gives you 10 years with one car seat. It's comfortable for your child and convenient for you as it transitions from rear-facing infant car seat (4-40 lbs.) to forward-facing 5-point harness seat (22–65 lbs.) to high-back belt-positioning booster (30–100 lbs.) to backless belt-positioning booster (40-120 lbs.). For a proper fit, the Simply Safe Adjust Harness System and 10-position headrest lets you adjust the harness and headrest together, with no rethreading. The 6-position recline keeps your child comfortable, while the InRight LATCH system with one-second attachment makes installation easy. It's the only seat that truly goes from baby to booster.

BRAND STORY
By Graco
feature_bullets: 4 in 1 Graco car seat gives you 10 years of use from four to 120 pounds
Rear facing baby car seat from 4 to 40 pounds
Forward facing toddler car seat from 22 to 65 pounds
Booster seats in high back belt positioning mode from 30 to 100 pounds and backless belt positioning mode from 40 to 120 pounds
InRight LATCH system for an Easy, 1 second LATCH attachment

Graco ProtectPlus Engineered: a combination of the most rigorous crash tests that helps protect Your child in frontal, side, rear & rollover crashes; additional testing based on the New Car Assessment Program and for extreme car interior temperatures

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,359 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
